org.shared.util

Class Arithmetic

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.shared.util.Arithmetic

  • public class Arithmetic
extends Object
    A collection of very basic arithmetic operations on arrays.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static Random randomKernel
      The underlying, shared source of randomness.

      • nextGaussian

        public static final double nextGaussian(double a)
        A wrapper for Random.nextGaussian().
        Parameters:
        a - the standard deviation.
        Returns:
        a sample drawn from a Gaussian with mean 0 and standard deviation a.

      • nextBytes

        public static final byte[] nextBytes(int n)
        A wrapper for Random.nextBytes(byte[]).
        Parameters:
        n - the size of the random byte array.
        Returns:
        a randomly generated byte array of length n.

      • randomize

        public static final void randomize()
        Seeds the underlying source of randomness with System.nanoTime().

      • derandomize

        public static final void derandomize()
        Seeds the underlying source of randomness with 0.
